abstract: San Francisco 49ers and running back Reggie Bush reach contract agreement.
lead_paragraph: Bush has agreed to contract terms with San Francisco after being released by Detroit to save salary-cap room.

headline.main: Reggie Bush, Cut by the Lions, Joins the 49ers
headline.print_headline: Bush, Cut by the Lions, Joins the 49ers

snippet: Bush has agreed to contract terms with San Francisco after being released by Detroit to save salary-cap room.
